message: Hi, does anyone have good tips for Fig bonsais? Mine dropped all of its leaves this fall. Thanks!

date: Tue Oct 29 2024 19:21:40 GMT+0200 (Eastern European Standard Time)
message: Hey, Fig bonsais love light. Try using a grow light!

message: Heey, are there any different new Monstera types coming any time soon? I was hoping to get a friend for my Monstera Albo..

date: Tue Oct 29 2024 19:27:25 GMT+0200 (Eastern European Standard Time)
message:
Hi Efe, we have more colors coming in the winter!

Susie, we unfortunately only have Monstera Deliciosa and Monstera Dubia in the selection. We are hoping to get more in the Spring.

date: Tue Oct 29 2024 19:28:33 GMT+0200 (Eastern European Standard Time)
